summary: This is an email from attorney Andrew Patel to an unspecified recipient, requesting a copy of a planned disclosure regarding Mr. Epstein. Patel indicates that seeing the disclosure will help address concerns discussed the previous night, suggesting coordination between legal parties.

persons.name: Andrew Patel
persons.context: Author of the email, requesting a copy of a planned disclosure regarding Mr. Epstein to help address concerns discussed the previous night.

events.title: Discussion about Epstein disclosure concerns
events.description: A discussion occurred the night before the email regarding concerns about a planned disclosure related to Mr. Epstein.

keyFacts: Attorney Andrew Patel is requesting a copy of a planned disclosure regarding Mr. Epstein.
The email suggests coordination between legal parties to address concerns about the disclosure.
The correspondence is dated December 20, 2019, after Epstein's death in August 2019, indicating ongoing legal matters.
